values: To inspire is to encourage someone by making them feel confident and eager to do something.
Jim’s father likes to inspire his son by encouraging him to follow his dream.
vt. 激发；鼓舞；启示；产生；使生灵感
vt.鼓舞；使产生灵感
v. to cause to happen or be created 使产生
v. to cause someone to have (a feeling or emotion) 激起，引起
